column2: Because of indulging in sexual intercourse, of the four fallings away how many fallings do the offences appertain to?
Because of … appertain to two fallings away …
there may be falling away from moral habit; there may be falling away from good behavior …
Because of, out of disrespect … spitting in water, of the four fallings away how many fallings away does the offence appertain to?
Concluded is the Third Chapter: that on Falling Away
